DOC.brief_title: Effect Increasing Time Spent Outdoors Myopia Prevention School-Aged Children Northeast China
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study develop school-based intervention aim prevent onset development myopia among school age child increase time spend outdoors among elementary secondary school student northeast China . It expect result provide evidence policy-makers school healthcare provider school child myopia prevention .
DOC.criteria: Grade 1 5 elementary school grade 7 8 secondary school . Visual defect eye disease ; wear orthokeratology ; refractive surgery history .
